name: Escape from Saharok
description:
Escape from Saharok is an ironic and canonical horror game about Saharok from Roblox and a parody of it from TikTok. Consequently, the protagonist is an 11 year old teenager who is passionate about searching and researching information about rare items etc. He finds himself in an abandoned village in the town of Saharburg, where he has to complete quests to uncover everything about Saharburg. However, it won't be easy for the hero, as they are quite complicated and dangerous.

!WARNING!

The game pulls on powerful computers, but you may see it drop to 23-45 FPS. So be careful when you run it!
